docs.lead_paragraph: The American mail steamer Baltic, Capt. COMSTOCK, arrived last night at about 10 o'clock, having left Liverpool on Wednesday, the 23d ult., at noon, and thus bringing news four days latter than that by the Cambria.

docs.lead_paragraph: "AN ACT to provide for Incorporation of Life and health Insurance Companies, and in relation to Agencies of such Companies." The above is the title of a bill introduced into the Assembly, on notice, by Mr. RUSSELL SMITH, of this City. It has been read twice and referred to the Committee on Banks and Insurance Companies, reported favorable from said Committee, and committed to the Committee of the Whole.

docs.lead_paragraph: THE MURDER OP JOHN McCARE IN WATER STREET-VERDICT OF THE JURY.--The investigation concerning the murder of JOHN McCABE, corner of Water and Oliver-streets, was resumed yesterday at the Fourth Ward Station House, before Coroner O'DONNELL and Jury.

headline.main: RURAL ECONOMY.; Gleanings of Fact and Practice in Fruit Culture. The Apple.

docs.lead_paragraph: GENERAL REMARKS.--LEONARD MASCAL has commonly had the honor accorded him of having been the first to introduce the common or cultivated apple into England, about the year 1525; and such is the universal estimation in which t is not held, and such the degree of care bestowed upon its cultivation, wherever it is known, that it would be difficult to say whether its varieties should be numbered by hundreds or thousands.

headline.main: Southern Mails--The Ship Italy--Col. Sloo--Mr King's Health.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Southern train which arrived at midday brought New-Orleans papers of Thursday, and two Charleston and Savannah malls. Col. SLOO, grantee of the new Tehuantepec contract, was at New Orleans.

byline.original: SPECIAL CORRESPONDENCE OF THE NEW-YORK DAILY TIMES

docs.lead_paragraph: Domestic Items. The South Carolina Medical Association met lately and had a capital time of it. The toast to JOHN HEART, Esq., Editor of the Charleston Mercury, was not bad: "He compounds in his laboratory, the only preparation of Mercury which even Thompsonians are willing to take."

docs.lead_paragraph: We regret to hear that BARNABAS BATES, Esq., the venerable champion and untiring advocate of cheap postage, is seriously ill in Boston, whither he went, some months since, for the par pose of securing the influence of the merchants of that city in favor of cheap Ocean Postage.
